function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne circulation of SARS-CoV-2 in hospital environment","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Improved air filtration and UV sterilisation technology, adherence to precautions to remove aerosolisation","Technologies":"Air filtration and UV sterilisation systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Hospital management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of agreed standard for sampling and detection of airborne viruses","Impact":"Inconsistent or unreliable data on airborne virus presence","Mitigation":"Development of standardized approaches for sampling and detection","Technologies":"Advanced sampling and detection technology","People":"Researchers, public health organizations","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Aerosol generating procedures increasing respiratory aerosols","Impact":"Higher risk of transmission during exertional respiratory activity","Mitigation":"Implementation of measures to reduce aerosol generation during exertion, use of advanced air filtration systems","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Hospital management, healthcare providers"}]}
